description: Geek Insights was organised by Geek Room on 19 April 2024 to enlighten beginner tech enthusiasts about the various tech domains and their scope in the field of technology..

An exhuberant hackathon with a massive 5,00,000+ prizepool , Techminds Hackathon was jointly conducted by Geek Room and IITM , Janakpuri from .
An informational event regarding rover design , ESP Camp Rover Design was organized jointly by E-Yantra  Geek Room and IEEE RAS MSIT .
A fun event with an AI-based blind dating model and concept , Cupid AI was conducted by Geek Room from  during 'Avensis'.
A 48-hour hackathon organised by Geek Room with over 300+ participants from 31 January - 1 February 2024 during the annual technical fest of MSIT 'Avensis'.
An informative session on the Beginner's Guide to Hackathons was held on 9 December 2023. The session was conducted by the Geek Room core which boast of many members of hackathon winning teams.
